responses: Hello! Welcome to Nesamony Memorial Christian College. How can I help you today?

See you soon!

Bye! Wishing you all the best.

Nesamony Memorial Christian College is a prestigious academic and research institution that caters to the studentsâ€™ academic and personal development, by providing a highly professional and open-minded education rooted in ethics and values. The college, sprawled in a lush green campus, has an excellent infrastructure, library, indoor-outdoor stadium, hostel and internet facilities. The college offers science, humanities, commerce and management disciplines with well-equipped department libraries and classrooms. We have dedicated and erudite faculty members who help in grooming the students to become world-class citizens in this globally competitive world.

ğŸ“ **Training and Placement Cell (TPC) â€“ Nesamony Memorial Christian College**

The Training and Placement Cell bridges the gap between the institute and companies. It organizes pre-placement training sessions to equip eligible students with the required skills, and facilitates placement interviews by reputed organisations both on-campus and off-campus.

ğŸ“ Nesamony Memorial Christian College is located at Marthandam â€“ 629165, Kanyakumari District, Tamil Nadu, India. You can view the location on Google Maps through the official website.
ğŸšŒ Transport facilities are available for students from nearby areas. For routes, timing, and fee details, please contact the college office.

patterns: tell me about nmcc rules and regulations
responses: Students at Nesamony Memorial Christian College are expected to follow strict discipline and maintain respectful behavior on campus. Wearing an identity card is mandatory, and students must follow the prescribed dress code. Regular attendance is required, with a minimum of 75% to appear for end-semester examinations. Smoking, alcohol, drugs, ragging, and indecent behavior are strictly prohibited. Students must protect college property, obtain permission for leave, and avoid misconduct both inside and outside the campus. Certificates such as Transfer, Bonafide, and Conduct are issued only after clearing all dues and submitting the required application.

ğŸ“ **Nesamony Memorial Christian College Anthem**

WE LOVE THIS COLLEGE WE LOVE HER TRUE
We love this College we love her true,
This Nesamony Memorial Christian College Marthandam

Weâ€™re proud of her name and weâ€™re proud of her fame
So join together and praise her name - For
We are one with the College,
That stands high, that stands very high,
We are one with the College
That stands high, for wisdom and purity.

We kneel to God when we start each day,
And seek His guidance to show the way - For
Wisdom comes with the fear of God
And this she taught us, let us praise her loud - For

With diligence do we strive so hard
To dispel darkness of ignorance
Good men of our land, weâ€™re taught to be
Iâ€™ll carry her banner for all to see - For

With FAITH in God we do look ahead,
His grace will bless all our ENDEAVOUR
In wisdom and POWER we are sure to grow
Godâ€™s mercy is great and this we know - For

âœï¸ **Written by: J.M. Arthur**

ğŸ“ **Nesamony Memorial Christian College Emblem**

The college emblem features a Cross, a Church, a Palmyra tree, a Star, an open Book, and a Lotus flower.

â€¢ **Cross and Church:** Represent the Christian identity of the institution and symbolize sacrifice, love, and holiness.
â€¢ **Palmyra Tree:** Reflects the productive nature of the institution and its connection to the region.
â€¢ **Guiding Star:** Inspires the college to lead people toward light and knowledge.
â€¢ **Open Book:** Signifies the liberating power of education.
â€¢ **Lotus Flower:** Our national flower, representing knowledge and wisdom gained by students.

â­ **Motto:** *FAITH, ENDEAVOUR, POWER* â€” expressing the core values that guide the college community.

ğŸ“ The upper age limit for admission to Undergraduate courses is **21 years** as on July 1 of the academic year.

ğŸ“Š Rank lists are prepared based on marks obtained in the subject component out of **400 marks under Part-III** in the Higher Secondary Examination.

Eligibility follows the guidelines of the respective Universities.

ğŸ“ The online application duly filled in all respects should reach the Principal within **10 working days** after publishing the results of the Plus Two Examination / UG Degree Examination.

ğŸ“Œ The application must be accompanied by photocopies of:
- Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate / UG Degree and Mark Sheet
- Transfer Certificate from the last institution studied
- Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last studied
- Community Certificate
- Income Certificate
- Blood Group Certificate
- Certificate for children of Ex-servicemen
- Certificate for physically handicapped candidates
- Games / Sports / NCC / NSS proficiency certificates
- Two stamp-size photographs (one affixed on the application form, one for the Identity Card)

âš ï¸ Note: Sports persons who have won inter-district or state-level competitions must attach supporting evidence.

ğŸ”– Important: Original certificates will not be returned before completion of the course. Applicants are advised to take sufficient attested copies before admission.

ğŸŒ **Online Admission Portal:** [Apply Here](https://nmcc.ac.in/apply.aspx)

ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ“ Selected candidates will be notified via the college notice board and website.

âœ… The applicant must attend the interview with a parent.
âœ… All ORIGINAL certificates must be produced.

Failure to provide originals will result in ineligibility.

ğŸ’° At the time of admission, students must pay the first installment of tuition and other fees.

âš ï¸ Students leaving after admission must pay the full year's fees before receiving their certificates.

SC/ST candidates are exempt from the initial payment.

ğŸ“„ A photocopy of the Community Certificate issued by the Tamil Nadu Government must be attached with the application, and the original should be shown at the time of interview.

âš ï¸ Note: This certificate is not necessary for candidates belonging to the forward community.

ğŸ“‘ Admission is subject to verification of mark statements by the Director of Government Examinations.

âš ï¸ If the mark certificate is found to be bogus, admission will be cancelled and criminal action may be taken against the candidate.

patterns: Who can apply for university scholarship

Tell me about university merit scholarships
How to get university merit scholarship
responses:
ğŸ“ **University Merit Scholarship**

This scholarship is awarded to academically outstanding students in both UG and PG programs.

âœ… **Eligibility:**

ğŸ“š **For UG Programs:**
â€¢ First Year â€“ Top 3 students based on +2 or equivalent exam scores.
â€¢ Second Year â€“ Top 3 students based on first-year & second semester results.
â€¢ Third Year â€“ Top 3 students based on the previous four semesters.

ğŸ“˜ **For PG Programs:**
â€¢ First Year â€“ Top 2 students based on major subject scores in UG.
â€¢ Second Year â€“ Top 2 students based on first-year PG semester results.

ğŸ”„ **Renewal Requirement:**
â€¢ Students must secure **75% or above** in their first attempt in every paper each semester.

ğŸ“„ Application forms are available for both **new** and **renewal** candidates.
